mapper.select: select p.stock from cartlist, products p where cartid = #{cartid} and cartlist.productno = p.productno
mapper.update: update cartlist set c_amount = #{amount} where cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.insert: insert into cartlist(cartid, productno, id, c_amount) values (cartid.nextval, #{productno}, #{id}, #{c_amount})
